author: Special Correspondent
text:
The agitation by the women’s wing of the DMK was held after getting due permission from the Returning Officer of the Salem North Assembly constituency.

The women’s wing of the party sought police permission for holding agitation in front of the collectorate on February 29 and the city police too accorded permission for the same.

However, the Election Commission announced the Assembly election schedule on March 4, slapping a ban on political activities such as demonstration etc. Hence, the police directed the DMK men to approach the Returning Officer of the Salem North constituency, under which the collectorate area falls, for getting fresh permission.

The office-bearers presented a fresh petition to C. Vijaybabu, RDO and Returning Officer of the Salem North constituency, who gave his green signal, the DMK sources said.
title: RO gives permission to hold agitation
